name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Field Engineer, I excel in customer-centric communication and collaboration, effectively bridging the gap between technical concepts and client needs. With a solid foundation in **electrical engineering** and **mechanical engineering**, I am adept at conducting thorough **risk assessments** and ensuring **Health and Safety** standards are met. My problem-solving skills have been honed through 8 years of experience in high-performance environments, specializing in digital technologies relevant to the field.

I bring expertise in **pump technology** and a deep understanding of operational efficiencies, ensuring projects are delivered on time and within compliance frameworks. My proficiency in digital literacy enhances my ability to interact with various stakeholders, facilitating a seamless and transparent process. I’m committed to leveraging my technical knowledge and collaborative approach to achieve optimal outcomes in every project.
